page.title: 03The Stud
page.content: The stud is owned by Lord Howard De- Wallden.He also owns another stud. The main attraction there is Kris the Stallion.Mares come from all over the world to see this one horse.When you first go into the stud there are two lodge houses I live in one of them. As you go further up the road there are two fields on either side of the road which are going to be hay.There is a small wood on both sides of the grass as you go up the road more you come to some isolation boxes.The mares go there when they first come to see Kris.The small wood then joins up to make one big wood called Bell Rush. Then you go into the park were they keep some cattle.Then if you turn right then you go to the spare boxes where the stud manager keeps his horses.There are some more houses down
